Shuttle+ Music Playerplay.google.com.amp_pro
AMP is easy to navigate, intuitive & constantly evolving to a better music player - aspiring to be the music player of choice for Android devices.

Features:
Playlists
Enqueue
Lockscreen controls (ICS+)
Notification controls (Honeycomb+)
Jelly Bean notification controls
Gapless playback (Jelly Bean +)
Landscape & portrait mode
Persistent now playing bar
Fast image caching
Customisable widget
Headset button controls
Automatically stop playing when disconnecting headset
Album Art Downloading
5 Band Equalizer
Gesture control
Scrobbling support
3 Different Themes!
What's in this version : (Updated : Jul 18, 2015)
Major performance improvements
Added option to view lists using palette, cards, grid or list items
Massively reduced RAM usage
Redesigned artist/album detail screen
Redesigned queue
Added song info dialog
Option to view/delete/update black & white lists
Updated theme colors to match Material design spec
Added option to 'restore purchases' (restore upgrade)
Added option to circumvent MediaStore when retrieving artwork
Required Android O/S : 2.2+
